ygData.subject: weird idea floating in my head
ygData.msgSnippet: You know, I had so much fun when I went as a newbie to Mathin s wedding that I was thinking that if a new server opens up shortly, wouldn t it be fun to create
ygData.messageBody:
You know, I had so much fun when I went as a
newbie to Mathin's wedding that I was thinking that if a
new server opens up shortly, wouldn't it be fun to
create characters on that server and play there at least
once a week, on a schedule, simply to be in touch
within Norrath itself? I am not suggesting anything as
outrageous as dedicating ourselves to these new characters,
just that it would be fun to actually be in the same
world with all the people we have contributing at the
posts...
